column1: '''Nodens Books''' is a publishing firm established by [[Douglas A. Anderson]] in [[2012]].
The firm is named after the [[Celtic]] god [[Wikipedia:Nodens|Nodens]]
column2: about which [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote an etymological essay (see: ''[[The Name 'Nodens']]'').
translated and edited by Stella M. Mills; Foreword by [[Priscilla Tolkien]]
